description: With AssemblyAI's industry-leading Speech AI models, transcribe speech to text and extract insights from your voice data.
title: AssemblyAI | AI models to transcribe and understand speech
introduction: AssemblyAI offers Speech AI models for accurate speech-to-text conversion, speaker detection, sentiment analysis, chapter detection, and PII redaction. Their most powerful model, Universal-1, is trained on 12.5M hours of multilingual audio data. Leading companies use AssemblyAI for innovative AI products with voice data.
features: LeMUR - Apply LLMs to voice data and explore various LLM capabilities
Audio Intelligence - Analyze and extract insights from voice data
pricing: Pricing scales based on usage, with options for different AI models and volume-based discounts.

faqs.question: What is Universal-1?
faqs.answer: Universal-1 is AssemblyAI's most powerful and accurate Speech AI model, trained on 12.5M hours of multilingual audio data.

faqs.question: What features does AssemblyAI offer?
faqs.answer: AssemblyAI offers features like automatic language detection, punctuation and casing, paragraph/sentence export, end of utterance detection, LeMUR for applying LLMs to voice data, audio intelligence for insights extraction, and PII audio redaction.

faqs.question: How does the pricing work?
faqs.answer: Pricing is based on usage, allowing users to choose AI models for their specific use cases and offering discounts for higher volumes.
